fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: CSDP, trade, development, accession, regional policies, climate change, peace and security.
source: GIZ, UK Foreign and Commonwealth Office,
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
Independent Diplomat (ID) is a unique, non-profit advisory group in the world of diplomacy. 
 
ID provides confidential advice and practical assistance in diplomatic strategy and technique to governments, political groups, international organisations and NGOs.  We work to amplify the voices of those who have most at stake in diplomatic processes.  Our work thus promotes greater inclusiveness in diplomacy, and contributes to more just and sustainable solutions to international problems and conflict.
